body_html:
@ngimel I tried setting iommu=soft to no avail. I also tried iommu=off along with intel_iommu=off also to no avail. Would you happen to have any other suggestions for Intel machines? Thanks for the assistance!

EDIT: I also didn't see any output in dmesg while running the p2pBandwidthLatencyTest sample
body_text:

body:
@ngimel I tried setting `iommu=soft` to no avail. I also tried `iommu=off` along with `intel_iommu=off` also to no avail. Would you happen to have any other suggestions for Intel machines? Thanks for the assistance!

EDIT: I also didn't see any output in `dmesg` while running the p2pBandwidthLatencyTest sample
